subdisciplines.name: Behavioral Neuroscience
subdisciplines.description: The study of how the brain and nervous system influence behavior and mental processes.

subdisciplines.name: Cognitive Psychology
subdisciplines.description: The study of mental processes such as "attention, language use, perception, problem solving, memory, and thinking"

subdisciplines.name: Developmental Psychology
subdisciplines.description: The study of how people change over time, physical, psychological, and social development

subdisciplines.name: Social Psychology
subdisciplines.description: The study of how people interact with each other and the environment, including how attitudes, beliefs, and behaviors are shaped by social factors.
